sentences.en: Among other things, the collector examines the class loader data structures to determine which classes are live -- that is, are not garbage collectable.
sentences.cn: 在众多的事情当中，收集器检查类装入器的数据结构，来判断哪个类是活动的 —— 也就是说，不应当被当作垃圾收集的。

sentences.en: Another popular method is to buy historic or mint gold coins that, due to their collectable nature, have a value greater than their pure precious metal content.
sentences.cn: 另一个比较流行的方式就是购买历史性的或者数量巨额的金币，由于他们具有的收藏价值，他们往往高于自身金属含量的价值。

sentences.en: Examples of its craftsmanship are now very collectable.
sentences.cn: 现在它的那些工艺的样品极有收藏价值.

sentences.en: The most collectable old magazines are those devoted to music, movies and fashion.
sentences.cn: 杂志收藏最值得收藏的旧杂志是那些专门刊载音乐, 电影和时尚的杂志.

sentences.en: These posters are rarer and hence very collectable.
sentences.cn: 这些海报非常罕见,因此非常有收藏价值.

sentences.en: They often come up for sale, but this more intimate and later artwork is quite rare and very collectable.
sentences.cn: 希特勒的画作常被拍卖，但这张卡片显得更为亲切，并且非常罕见，收藏价值很高。

sentences.en: This is especially useful if rare or collectable beads are purchase beads.
sentences.cn: 尤其是需要购买稀有珠宝或是要收藏珠宝时非常有用.

sentences.en: Tom : Shampoo bottles, detergent bottles, medicine bottles, food containers, etc. They all easily collectable and reusable.
sentences.cn: T:洗发水包装瓶, 洗涤剂瓶, 医药瓶, 食品容器等他们都比较收藏和可重复使用.

sentences.en: Visitors will be impressed with the enormous range of collectable objets d'art on offer.
sentences.cn: 特价出售、值得收藏的精美艺术品种类繁多，将会让参观者大开眼界。

words.tran_cn: 可收集的；可回收的（等于collectable）
集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的
收集成地；冷静地，镇定地
采集，聚集；[税收] 征收；收藏品；募捐
收藏家；[电子] 集电极；收税员；征收者
集团化；使集体化；使之成为共同的（等于collectivise）

trans.tran_en: something that is collectable is likely to be bought and kept as part of a group of similar things, especially because it might increase in value
